title: A local redistricting battle in a New York City suburb may lead to a national fight
description: In one of the most segregated U.S. regions — New York's suburbs — voters of color are waging an unprecedented redistricting fight with an emerging tool for protecting voting rights at the local level.

title: Gabby Douglas comes back to competitive gymnastics this month, eyeing the Olympics
description: Twelve years after stunning the world gymnastics stage with a historic Olympic performance, Douglas, now 28, will compete in a qualifier for the 2024 U.S. Gymnastics Championships.

title: U.S. drone strike kills a leader of an Iran-backed militia in Iraq
description: A U.S. drone strike in the Iraqi capital has killed at least one leader of an Iran-backed militia, Kataib Hezbollah.

title: Israel rejects Hamas' cease-fire plan after meeting with Blinken
description: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu has rejected a cease-fire plan delivered by the Palestinian militant group Hamas to end the war in Gaza.

title: A missing helicopter carrying 5 Marines is located in California mountains
description: The Marine Corps helicopter was found Wednesday morning in a mountainous area outside San Diego. But rescue crews said snowy conditions were making access challenging on the ground.

title: MSNBC host Joy-Ann Reid revisits the legacy and marriage of Medgar and Myrlie Evers
description: Reid's new book, Medgar and Myrlie, tells the stories of the civil rights leader from Mississippi and his wife, who became a civil rights activist after Medgar's 1963 assassination.

title: With border deal derailed by GOP opposition, Democrats move to pass Ukraine aid
description: After four months of bipartisan talks on border security  Senate Republicans backed off backing changes to the Biden administration's policies they demanded. Democrats moved to pass aid for allies.

title: Chaos in Congress over border security; 'None of the above' wins Nevada's primary
description: Congressional Republicans are opposing a border bill that they demanded. Nikki Haley loses the Nevada primary.

title: European Union scraps pesticide proposal in another concession to protesting farmers
description: The European Union shelved an anti-pesticide proposal Tuesday in another concession to farmers after weeks of protests that blocked many capitals and economic lifelines across the 27-nation bloc.

title: ESPN, Fox and Warner Bros. Discovery plan to launch a sports streaming platform
description: The platform will include games from the NFL, NBA, MLB, NHL, WNBA, NASCAR and college sports, including the men's and women's NCAA Tournament, as well as golf, tennis and the FIFA World Cup.
